delete.text: DATA RECOVERY: Take top card from Discard. Shuffle Discard to bottom.

execute.text: NEURAL EXPANSION: Draw 3 Tiles. Place 1 Neutral Tile. Discard 2.

write.text: TECTONIC.EXE: Shift current ROW or COLUMN one space.

execute.text: FORCE REBOOT: Rotate any 1 Tile on the board 90 degrees.

write.text: PIVOT.LOG: Rotate THIS tile 90 degrees before Robot exits.

execute.text: HOT SWAP: Swap 2 unowned tiles on the board.

write.text: BRIDGE.EXE: Create a Neutral Tile on an adjacent empty space.

execute.text: TELEPORT: Move Robot to any Neutral Tile.

write.text: JUMP_GATE: Move Robot to any other Tile you own.

execute.text: MAP_SURVEY: Draw 2 Tiles. Add 1 to hand, 1 to bottom of deck.

write.text: AUTOPATH: If the next tile is empty, place a Neutral Tile there.

action.function: lambda g: g.place_tile('neutral') if g.is_next_empty() else g

execute.text: REWRITE: Change the exit direction of one tile for this turn.

write.text: ENCRYPT: This tile cannot be Moved or Rotated by opponents.

execute.text: ORGANIZE: Rearrange your entire Program Stack.

write.text: SLIDE.SYS: Shift the Robot one tile Left or Right (if possible).

execute.text: SIGNAL_BOOST: All players draw 2 cards.

write.text: REMOTE_ACCESS: Trigger the Write effect of an adjacent tile.

execute.text: HOT PATCH: Place a new Tile directly on top of any Neutral Tile.

write.text: RE-SKIN: Change this tile's ownership to Neutral after the Robot leaves.

action.function: lambda g: g.queue_event('exit', lambda game: game.set_owner(target='self', owner='neutral'))

execute.text: REFLECT: Flip any Tile 180 degrees. Robot maintains current vector.

write.text: REVERSE_POLARITY: Robot exits this tile through the same side it entered.

execute.text: EXPAND: Add 2 Neutral Tiles to the board from the supply.

write.text: LONG_PATH: Robot must move 1 extra space while on this tile.

execute.text: SIGNAL_JUMP: Connect two tiles that are not touching for 1 move.

write.text: TUNNEL: Robot moves to the nearest owned tile in a straight line.

execute.text: DUPLICATE: Copy the layout of an adjacent tile onto a Neutral Tile.

write.text: SYNC: Trigger the Write effect of every tile you own in this Row.

execute.text: CACHE: Put 1 card from hand under your Player Board. Draw 2.

write.text: RECALL: Add the card stored under your Board to your Hand.

execute.text: WARP: Swap the positions of the Robot and any Neutral Tile.

write.text: SLIDE_LOCK: This Row cannot be shifted while the Robot is on it.

execute.text: SCAN: Look at an opponent's hand. You may move 1 card to their Stack.

write.text: VERIFY: If you own 3+ tiles in a line, gain +2 Battery Volts.

action.function: lambda g: g.add_battery(2) if g.check_line_owned(3) else g

execute.text: DISCONNECT: Move a Neutral tile to a space where it touches no other tiles.

write.text: AIR_GAP: Mechanically, this tile is considered adjacent to nothing.

execute.text: SCRAMBLE: Gather all Neutral tiles on board and redistribute them randomly.

write.text: PHYSICAL_SWAP: Swap this tile's location with another owned tile's location.

execute.text: EMULATE: Treat one tile as having a different path configuration for this turn.

write.text: MIRROR_MODE: The exits on this tile are reversed (Left becomes Right, etc).

execute.text: RESERVE: Place a 'Block' token on an empty space. No tiles can be placed there.

write.text: PRE_FETCH: Before robot leaves this tile, rotate an adjacent tile 90 degrees.

execute.text: DISTRIBUTE: Move Robot to the owned tile with the fewest neighbors.

write.text: GRAVITY_SHIFT: Shift this row towards the side of the board with fewer tiles.

execute.text: TRANSFER: Move 1 card from your Stack to an opponent's Stack (it retains your ownership).

write.text: RELOCATE: Swap the physical position of this tile with any Neutral tile on the board.

execute.text: BOOT_ORDER: Look at the top 5 cards of the deck. Place up to 2 in your Stack, rest on bottom.

write.text: QUEUE_SYNC: Trigger the 'Write' effect of the very first card in your Program Stack.

execute.text: VOLTAGE_JUMP: Add +3 Volts to the Battery. Immediately end your turn.

write.text: TURBO_MODE: The Robot moves 2 tiles forward from here, ignoring the next tile's effects.

delete.text: LIVE LOAD: Write 1 card from hand into Stack at any position.

execute.text: INSTANT PATCH: Execute 1 card from hand as if in Stack.

write.text: REPEAT: If Battery > 8, Reset Program Counter to 0.

action.function: lambda g: g.set_pc(0) if g.battery > 8 else g

execute.text: NEGATE: Cancel an opponent's Execute action.

write.text: SKIP: If Battery < 5, Skip the next 2 cards in this Stack.

action.function: lambda g: g.inc_pc(3) if g.battery < 5 else g

execute.text: DEBUG: View the top 3 cards of the deck. Reorder them.

write.text: BRANCH: If Robot is on a corner tile, Execute next card twice.

action.function: lambda g: g.queue_multiplier(target='next', val=2) if g.is_at_corner() else g

execute.text: LOOP: Move the Robot 1 extra space this turn.

write.text: HOLD: Robot stops here. It does not move next turn.

execute.text: QUICK_FIX: Swap this card with a card in your Stack.

write.text: WAIT: If you have < 3 cards in hand, Draw 2 cards.

action.function: lambda g: g.draw(2) if len(g.hand) < 3 else g

execute.text: RECOVER: If you Off-Track this turn, do not lose ownership.

write.text: FAIL_SAFE: If next tile is Red, Jump PC to end of stack.

action.function: lambda g: g.set_pc('end') if g.next_tile_color == 'Red' else g

execute.text: RE-ROUTE: Move your Program Counter to any position.

write.text: JUMP: Move the Robot 2 tiles forward, skipping all effects.

execute.text: ACCESS: Draw 1 card. If it is Blue, draw another card.

action.function: lambda g: g.draw(1).draw(1) if g.last_drawn.color == 'Blue' else g

write.text: IF_OWNED: If you own the next tile, execute this Stack twice.

action.function: lambda g: g.queue_multiplier(target='stack', val=2) if g.is_next_owned() else g

execute.text: ITERATE: Select 1 card in your Stack. Move it to the top.

write.text: LOOP_ALL: Gain 1 VP for every unique color in your Program Stack.

execute.text: BREAK: Stop an opponent's Move or Shift immediately.

write.text: HALT: The Robot cannot be moved by Blue cards while on this tile.

execute.text: TRUE_FALSE: Look at the top card of the deck. Discard or Keep it.

write.text: NOT_OPERATOR: Treat the next Red card in this stack as a Green card.

execute.text: REFERENCE: Name a card. If an opponent has it, they must Discard it.

write.text: REDIRECT: Move the Robot to the Start Tile. Do not reset Battery.

execute.text: VOID: Remove 1 card from your Stack. Add it to your hand.

write.text: ERROR_HAND: If this is the only card in your Stack, gain 5 VP.

action.function: lambda g: g.add_vp(5) if g.stack_size == 1 else g

execute.text: INSPECT: View an opponent's entire Program Stack.

write.text: DEBUG_LOG: Replace the next card in this Stack with one from hand.

execute.text: REFRESH: Discard hand and draw the same number of cards.

write.text: DIRECTIONAL_IF: IF entering from N|S execute NEXT. ELSE skip NEXT.

action.function: lambda g: g.inc_pc(1) if g.entry_vector in ['N','S'] else g.inc_pc(2)

execute.text: CATCH: Cancel a Red 'Execute' action targeting you.

write.text: ERROR_TO_VP: If Red card triggers in stack, gain +2 VP instead.

execute.text: QUEUE: Play card face-down. Reveal and execute at start of next turn.

write.text: PAUSE: Robot stops here. Resume next turn with +2 move range.

execute.text: SEARCH: Search deck for specific title, add to hand. Shuffle.

write.text: JUMP_TO_COLOR: Move PC to the next Yellow card in this stack.

execute.text: HALT_ROBOT: Stop the Robot's movement immediately.

write.text: STOP_EXEC: Stop processing this Program Stack immediately.

execute.text: EXEC_DISCARD: Perform the 'Execute' effect of top discard card.

write.text: POST_EXEC: After finishing stack, execute top discard card.

execute.text: FILTER: Reveal top 5 deck cards. Keep all of one color.

write.text: COLOR_MATCH: If prev tile owner == next tile owner, Draw 1.

action.function: lambda g: g.draw(1) if g.prev_tile.owner == g.next_tile.owner else g

execute.text: MULTI_TASK: Take another full turn immediately.

write.text: PARALLEL: Execute the card ABOVE and BELOW this one simultaneously.

execute.text: LIMIT: Target tile cannot be activated > once this round.

write.text: ONCE_PER_TURN: Ignore this if stack already triggered this turn.

action.function: lambda g: g if g.has_triggered_stack else g.mark_triggered()

execute.text: EMPTY_HAND_DRAW: If your hand is empty, draw 3 cards.

action.function: lambda g: g.draw(3) if len(g.hand) == 0 else g

write.text: FALLBACK: If the NEXT card generates 0 VP, gain 2 VP instead.

action.function: lambda g: g.add_vp(2) if g.predict_vp(g.pc+1) == 0 else g

delete.text: SHORT CIRCUIT: Subtract -1 Volt from the shared Battery.

execute.text: DOS: Target player must discard 2 cards.

write.text: LOGIC BOMB: Next player here moves PC forward 3 spaces.

action.function: lambda g: g.queue_trap('next_player', lambda game: game.inc_pc(3))

execute.text: NUKE: Remove top card from an opponent's Program Stack.

write.text: OVERFLOW: Swap your current card with opponent's current card.

execute.text: INFECT: Place this card into an opponent's Program Stack.

write.text: DRAIN: All players lose 1 VP. Battery -1 Volt.

execute.text: CRASH: Force an opponent to Rotate a tile they own.

write.text: WIPE: Remove all Neutral tiles adjacent to this tile.

execute.text: STEAL: Take 1 random card from an opponent's hand.

write.text: HIJACK: Use the Execute effect of the tile the Robot just left.

execute.text: EXPOSE: All players must play with their hands face-up.

write.text: SCRAMBLE: Reverse the exits of the next 2 tiles.

execute.text: SHUTDOWN: Immediately end the current turn.

write.text: UNDERFLOW: Move Program Counter to position 9.

execute.text: WORM: Put this card into an opponent's hand. They cannot discard it.

write.text: STUCK: This card cannot be removed from this Stack by the owner.

execute.text: LAG: Target player skips their next Passive Draw.

write.text: DROPPED: Opponent must discard the top card of their Stack.

execute.text: THERMAL: Choose 1 Tile. It becomes Neutral. Owner loses ownership.

write.text: BURN: Subtract -2 Volts from the Battery after scoring.

action.function: lambda g: g.queue_event('post_score', lambda game: game.add_battery(-2))

execute.text: LOCK: Target player cannot use Yellow cards until their next turn.

write.text: PAYWALL: To execute the next card, the owner must discard 1 card.

execute.text: STEALTH: Play this card face-down into an opponent's Stack.

write.text: HIDDEN: When triggered, steal 2 VP from the owner of this tile.

execute.text: FLOOD: Every player must discard down to 3 cards.

write.text: TRAFFIC: Every time the Robot moves, Battery -1 Volt.

action.function: lambda g: g.add_trigger('on_move', lambda game: game.add_battery(-1))

execute.text: SHRED: Discard the top 3 cards of the deck.

write.text: CORRUPT: Change the color of this tile to Red for all logic checks.

execute.text: FREEZE: Target opponent cannot play Execute (Hand) cards this turn.

write.text: SKIP_TILE: The Robot immediately moves to next tile without further code.

execute.text: FLOOD: Opponent draws cards until they have 7 in hand.

write.text: CLOG: If you have > 4 cards in hand, discard 2 random cards.

action.function: lambda g: g.discard_random(2) if len(g.hand) > 4 else g

execute.text: RESET_ALL: All players shuffle hands into deck and draw 3 cards.

write.text: CRASH_END: Reset Program Counter to 0 and immediately end turn.

execute.text: SNOOP: Look at top 3 cards of opponent's Stack and reorder them.

write.text: MIGRATE: After triggering, move to top of next player's Stack.

action.function: lambda g: g.queue_event('post_activation', lambda game: game.move_card(source='self', target='next_player_stack'))

execute.text: JAM: Target opponent reveals hand and discards all Blue cards.

write.text: LATENCY: Lose 1 VP for every Blue card currently in your Stack.

execute.text: WIPE_OWNER: Choose an owned tile. It becomes a Neutral tile.

write.text: NULL_VALUE: All Green cards in this stack generate 0 VP this turn.

execute.text: IGNORE: Cancel a Yellow Reaction card played against you.

write.text: GHOST_MODE: The Robot does not trigger Stack of the next tile.

execute.text: GIFT: Put card in opponent hand. If played, they lose 2 VP.

write.text: DEPLOY: When triggered, move this card into opponent's Stack.

execute.text: QUERY: Name Color. Opponent reveals hand and discards that color.

write.text: REWRITE_IF: Change condition of next Yellow card to 'IF BATTERY < 3'.

execute.text: BRICK: Tile cannot be rotated or shifted for the rest of the game.

write.text: TOLL: To move off this tile, the owner must discard 1 Blue card.

action.function: lambda g: g.add_trigger('on_exit', lambda game: game.cost({'discard_color': 'Blue', 'count': 1}))

delete.text: POWER SURGE: Add +1 Volt to the shared Battery.

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: NETWORK LINK: Gain 1 VP + 1 VP per adjacent owned tile.

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: FLAT_FILE: Gain 2 VP if this tile is at the edge of the map.

action.function: lambda g: g.add_vp(2) if g.current_tile.is_edge else g

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: HARVEST: Gain 1 VP for every Blue card in your hand.

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: BUFFER: Gain 3 VP if your Program Stack has 5+ cards.

action.function: lambda g: g.add_vp(3) if len(g.stack) >= 5 else g

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: OVERCLOCK: Gain 1 VP for every 5 Volts currently in the Battery.

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: SERIAL: Gain 1 VP. If next tile is also yours, gain 2 VP instead.

action.function: lambda g: g.add_vp(2) if g.next_tile.owner == 'self' else g.add_vp(1)

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: STATIC: Gain 2 VP. Subtract -1 Volt from the Battery.

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: COLLECT: Gain 1 VP for every 2 tiles currently on the board.

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: STABILITY: Gain 1 VP for every turn the Robot has not Off-Tracked.

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: RECYCLE: Gain 1 VP for every 3 cards in the Discard pile.

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: NETWORK: Gain 1 VP for every Neutral Tile on the board.

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: SECURE: Gain 3 VP if no Red cards are currently in your Stack.

action.function: lambda g: g.add_vp(3) if not g.stack.has_color('Red') else g

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: LEAK: Gain 1 VP. All opponents must discard 1 card.

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: EXTRACT: Gain 1 VP for every 2 Yellow cards in your Stack.

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: ANCIENT: Gain 4 VP if this card is at the bottom of your Stack.

action.function: lambda g: g.add_vp(4) if g.pc == len(g.stack) - 1 else g

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: THROUGHPUT: Gain 1 VP for every tile the Robot moves this turn.

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: CLEANUP: Gain 1 VP for every empty card slot in your maximum hand size.

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: ZIP_FILE: Gain 5 VP. You must immediately discard your entire hand.

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: SHARED_LINK: Gain 2 VP if an opponent owns a tile adjacent to this one.

action.function: lambda g: g.add_vp(2) if g.count_neighbors(owner='opponent') > 0 else g

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: LEDGER: Gain 1 VP. The next player to score VP must give you 1 of theirs.

execute.text: LOCKED

write.text: FULL_CHARGE: If the Battery is at Maximum Capacity, gain 3 VP.

action.function: lambda g: g.add_vp(3) if g.battery == g.max_battery else g

execute.text: LOCKED: ACCESS_DENIED

write.text: AVAILABILITY: Gain 1 VP for every tile in the longest continuous path.

execute.text: LOCKED: ACCESS_DENIED

write.text: RAID_ARRAY: Gain 3 VP if you have a card with the same Title in your Hand.

action.function: lambda g: g.add_vp(3) if g.hand.has_duplicate(g.current_card.title) else g

execute.text: LOCKED: ACCESS_DENIED

write.text: COMPUTE_POWER: Gain 1 VP for every 4 cards in the shared Discard pile.
